channel.title: Azure help? Rep++
channel.description:
[s]I can't get my RuneSource to run, here is the error I received.
[CODE]Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs2.Server Press any key to continue...[/CODE]
Here is my run. [code]@echo off @title [%date%] RuneSource
java -cp ./bin/;./libs/xpp3_min-1.1.4c.jar;./libs/xstream-1.3.1.jar com.rs2.Server localhost 43594 600 pause[/code][/s]
Never mind I was missing some files.
